biotools.summary:
snpXplorer is a web application to explore human SNP-associations and annotate SNP-sets. snpXplorer is an online open source web-server to explore associations from Genome-Wide Association Studies (GWAS). snpXplorer offers a wide range of possibilities, including overlap of multiple studies. Please see the documentation in this repository to get more information about how to run snpXplorer and its options.

||| NAME EQUAL TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/snpxplorer
